content: Jason Lemkin is recognized as one of the leading SaaS investors of the last decade, with a portfolio that includes companies such as Algolia, Talkdesk, Owner, RevenueCat, and Saleloft.
Rory Oâ€™Driscoll, a General Partner at Scale, has led investments in category leaders including Bill.com (BILL), Box (BOX), DocuSign (DOCU), and WalkMe (WKME).
